short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered translation and deep analysis tool. Enhancing work and study efficiency by improving reading comprehension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InterStand is not just a Chrome extension; the Windows version (Apple version coming soon ðŸ¤©) is compatible with nearly all other software. You can easily use InterStand for one-click translation in Microsoft Word, Adobe PDF, Kindle, Notion, WhatsApp, web browsers, and any other software ðŸ«¶. Developed by a team of experienced educational psychologists , InterStand helps users deeply understand and interpret text. Unlike immersive paragraph translations, InterStand allows users to focus on specific points for a better understanding of content and concepts. Based on educational theories and learning science, InterStand helps users build a strong foundation of prior knowledge and knowledge systems. Using AI technology, InterStand provides in-depth and accurate translations and explanations.
